==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|むら|さめ|yomi=kun}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|群|tr1=mura|t1=gather|雨|tr2=same|t2=rain|lang=ja}}. Literally rain that falls when clouds gather together.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[murasame]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|むらさめ}}

# rainfall that suddenly starts and stops

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|群雨}}
* {{l|ja|村雨}}
